institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Ministry of Employment and Labor Consignment Project Subsidy Processing Rules/Article 8 (Keeping of Ledger)
contents: Article 8 (Keeping ledgers) The head of the affiliated organization shall apply the provisions of Articles 15 to 19 of the Enforcement Rules of the Accounting Regulations in order to maintain records of the status of subsidy payment, and shall file the following subsidy payment-related documents on a monthly basis. It must be preserved for 5 years., 1. Print out the support fund transfer details and list of transferees on the day and file them with the application documents for each project after payment, 2. Other necessary supporting documents.
